name: 劉宛淯
objective:
本課程在培養同學創業的知識與思維，以及了解營運模式如何應用在商業活動裡。本課程包含: 創業精神的想法和行動、從失敗中學習、設計思考、市場測試、機會衡量、營運模式建立、價值主張、永續經營、企業倫理等議題。
The course is to encourage students to have the ideas of entrepreneurship and to establish the abilities of running a business. This course is focused on: entrepreneurial thought and action, learning from failure、design thinking、opportunity evaluation、market tests、the development of business model、value propositions、network、sustainable and business ethics.

Entrepreneurship thought & action (ET&A)
value proposition, revenue model, business canvas
building Entrepreneurship team
Design thinking
The basics of Entrepreneurship Finance
opportunity evaluation, business tests, failure & acceptance
family business
crowd funding  
Entrepreneurship financing from V.C. and Angel
schedule:
1-9 weeks: 
Entrepreneurship thought & action (ET&A), value proposition, revenue model, business canvas, building Entrepreneurship team, Design thinking, The basics of Entrepreneurship Finance

10-18weeks:  
opportunity evaluation, business tests, failure & acceptance, family business
crowd funding  , Entrepreneurship financing from V.C. and Angel
